Package net.dean.jraw.http.oauth

Contains classes related to authorizing clients with OAuth2

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Credentials
    This class is responsible for handling any kind of Reddit user and OAuth2 credentials
    OAuthData
    This class represents the data provided from a successful request to /api/v1/access_token.
    OAuthHelper
    This class assists developers using this library in authenticating users via OAuth2.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    AppType
    Represents the list of available Reddit OAuth2 apps
    OAuthHelper.AuthStatus
    Represents the different states of authorization this class can be in
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    InvalidScopeException
    Thrown when Reddit 403's a request because the client lacks the required OAuth2 scope.
    OAuthException
    Thrown when an error relating to authenticating with OAuth2 presents itself

Package net.dean.jraw.http.oauth Description

Contains classes related to authorizing clients with OAuth2
